DIA_ARS_VillaTrialog_03_01: I'm telling you, he's gonna pay for this! I don't pay my debts?! Me?! I always pay on time! Always! I won't let him cheat me anymore!
DIA_ARS_VillaTrialog_03_02: He thinks he is so great because everyone in town is afraid of him, because he has such a big villa!
DIA_ARS_VillaTrialog_03_03: Damn it! He ripped off most of the poor and honest citizens...
